lifeEventForm.title: Benefit finder: retirement
lifeEventForm.summary:
Retirement should be celebrated.

Spend more time enjoying life, less time finding benefits.

Answer a few questions and get a list of your potential benefits.

fieldset.legend: Are you a U.S. citizen or eligible non-citizen?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_citizen_status
inputCriteria.label: Are you a U.S. citizen or eligible non-citizen?

fieldset.legend: Did you ever work and pay Social Security taxes on your earnings?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_paid_into_SS
inputCriteria.label: Did you ever work and pay Social Security taxes?

fieldset.legend: Do you have limited income and resources?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_income
inputCriteria.label: Do you have limited income and resources?

fieldset.legend: Are you a member of a federally recognized American Indian Tribe or an Alaska Native?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_american_indian
inputCriteria.label: Are you a member of a federally recognized American Indian Tribe or an Alaska Native?

fieldset.legend: Do you have a disability or impairment?
fieldset.hint: Including a physical, sensory, or intellectual disability.

inputCriteria.name: applicant_disability
inputCriteria.label: Do you have a physical or mental impairment (including an emotional or learning disability)?

fieldset.legend: Are you unable to work for a year or more because of a disability or your disability is expected to result in death?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_ability_to_work
inputCriteria.label: Are you unable to work for a year or more because of a disability, or your disability is expected to result in death?

fieldset.legend: Are you caring for a child of a person who is retired, has disabilities, or has died, and the child is disabled or under the age of 16?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_care_for_child
inputCriteria.label: Are you caring for a child of someone who is retired, has a disability, or has died, and the child is disabled or under the age of 16?

fieldset.legend: Are you the child or spouse of a person who is receiving retirement or disability benefits?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_child_spouse_SS
inputCriteria.label: Are you the child or spouse of a person who is receiving retirement or disability benefits?

fieldset.legend: Did you work in the coal mining industry and have an illness caused by black lung disease (pneumoconiosis)?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_miner
inputCriteria.label: Did you work in the coal mining industry and have an illness caused by black lung disease (pneumoconiosis)?

fieldset.legend: Did you serve in the active military, naval or air service?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_served_in_active_military
inputCriteria.label: Did you serve in the active military, naval, or air service?

values.option: Discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
values.value: Discharged under conditions other than dishonorable

values.option: Member of the National Guard or Reserves
values.value: Member of the National Guard or Reserves

fieldset.legend: Was your disability caused or made worse by your active-duty military service?

inputCriteria.name: applicant_service_disability
inputCriteria.label: Was your disability caused or made worse by your active-duty military service?

benefit.title: Supplemental Security Income (SSI) for adults
benefit.summary: Financial assistance to meet basic needs for food, clothing, and shelter for people who are older or with disabilities. You only need one application to apply for all disability benefits offered by SSA.

agency.title: Social Security Administration (SSA)
agency.summary: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.

eligibility.label: You are at least 65 years
You are a US citizen or eligible non-citizen
You have limited income and resources

benefit.title: Retirement benefits for child with disabilities
benefit.summary: A replacement income for adult children with disabilities of qualified retirees and families receiving retirement benefits. You only need one application to apply for all disability benefits offered by SSA.

agency.title: Social Security Administration (SSA)
agency.summary: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.

eligibility.label: You are under 18 years
Your marital status is unmarried
You are a US citizen or eligible non-citizen
You have a disability or impairment
You are unable to work for a year or more because of a disability or your disability is expected to result in death
You are a child or a spouse of a person who is receiving retirement or disability benefits

benefit.title: Veteran's pension
benefit.summary: Monthly payments to wartime veterans with specific age, disability, income, or net worth criteria.

agency.title: Veterans Affairs Department (VA)
agency.summary: Provides a wide range of benefits in support of veterans, service members, and their families.

eligibility.label: You are at least 65 years
You have limited income and resources
You served in the active military
Your service status is: discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
acceptableValues: Discharged under conditions other than dishonorable

benefit.title: Tax-advantaged retirement plans information
benefit.summary: Learn about tax-advantaged retirement plans and how to manage retirement savings during changes in your life.

agency.title: Internal Revenue Service (IRS)
agency.summary: Administers and enforces U.S. federal tax laws.
agency.lede: Administers and enforces U.S. federal tax laws.

eligibility.label: You are at least 62 years

benefit.title: Medicare Savings Programs (MSP)
benefit.summary: Get help paying Medicare insurance, like deductibles, coinsurance, and copayments.

agency.title: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid (CMS)
agency.summary: Administers Medicare, Medicaid, and the Health Insurance Exchanges.

eligibility.label: You are over 65 years
You have a disability or impairment
You have limited income and resources

benefit.title: Retirement benefits for child
benefit.summary: Replacement income for underaged children of qualified retirees and families receiving retirement benefits. You only need one application to apply for all disability benefits offered by SSA.

agency.title: Social Security Administration (SSA)
agency.summary: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.

eligibility.label: You are under 18 years
Your marital status is unmarried
You are a US citizen or eligible non-citizen
You are a child or a spouse of a person who is receiving retirement or disability benefits

benefit.title: Thrift Savings Plan (TSP)
benefit.summary: A Federal Government-sponsored retirement savings and investment plan for members of the uniformed services and federal employees. The TSP offers the same type of savings and tax benefits that private corporations offer employees under '401(k)' plans.

agency.title: Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board (FRTIB)
agency.summary: Helps current and former civilian employees and members of the uniformed services prepare for their retirement with the Thrift Savings Plan (TSP).

eligibility.label: You worked and paid Social Security taxes on your earnings
You are at least 60 years
You are a US citizen or eligible non-citizen

benefit.title: Retirement benefits for spouse
benefit.summary: A replacement income for spouses of qualified retirees. You only need one application to apply for all disability benefits offered by SSA.

agency.title: Social Security Administration (SSA)
agency.summary: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.

eligibility.label: You are 62 years or older
Your marital status is married
You are a US citizen or eligible non-citizen
You are a child or a spouse of a person who is receiving retirement or disability benefits

benefit.title: Medicare with retirement
benefit.summary: A health insurance program for Americans aged 65 and older, and for people with disabilities.

agency.title: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid (CMS)
agency.summary: Administers Medicare, Medicaid, and the Health Insurance Exchanges.

eligibility.label: You are over 65 years old
You are a US citizen or eligible non-citizen

benefit.title: Concurrent Retirement and Disability Payments (CRDP)
benefit.summary: Offsets military retired pay due for VA disability compensation. Eligibility is automatic. No application is needed.

agency.title: Department of Defense (DOD)
agency.summary: Provides support for qualified spouses, children, and other family members of deceased service members.

eligibility.label: You are 60 years or older
You have a disability or impairment
You served in the active military
Your service status is: retired from the service or member of the National Guard or Reserves
acceptableValues: Member of the National Guard or Reserves

benefit.title: Social Security Disability Insurance
benefit.summary: Financial assistance to people with disabilities. You only need one application to apply for all disability benefits offered by SSA.

agency.title: Social Security Administration (SSA)
agency.summary: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.

eligibility.label: You worked and paid Social Security taxes on your earnings

benefit.title: Combat-Related Special Compensation (CRSC)
benefit.summary: Pays added benefits to retirees with at least 20 years of service and who receive VA compensation for combat-related disabilities.

agency.title: Department of Defense (DOD)
agency.summary: Provides support for qualified spouses, children, and other family members of deceased service members.

eligibility.label: You have a disability or impairment
You served in the active military
Your service status is: retired from the service
Your disability was caused, or made worse by your active-duty military service

benefit.title: Housing improvement program
benefit.summary: Helps with home repair, renovation, replacement, and new housing for American Indian and Alaska Native individuals and families with no resources for standard housing.

agency.title: Department of Interior (DOI) - Indian Affairs
agency.summary: The Bureau of Indian Affairs enhances the quality of life and protects and improves the trust assets of American Indians, Indian tribes, and Alaska Natives.
agency.lede: The Bureau of Indian Affairs enhances the quality of life and protects and improves the trust assets of American Indians, Indian tribes, and Alaska Natives.

eligibility.label: You have limited income and resources
You are a member of a federally recognized American Indian Tribe or an Alaska Native

benefit.title: Retirement benefits
benefit.summary: Replacement income for qualified retirees and their families. You only need one application to apply for all disability benefits offered by SSA.

agency.title: Social Security Administration (SSA)
agency.summary: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.

eligibility.label: You worked and paid Social Security taxes on your earnings
You are over 62 years
You are a US citizen or eligible non-citizen

benefit.title: Coal mine workers' compensation (black lung benefits)
benefit.summary: Compensation to coal miners who were totally disabled by black lung disease (pneumoconiosis) or surviving spouses of miners whose deaths are attributable to this disease. Also provides medical coverage for treatment of related lung diseases.

agency.title: Department of Labor (DOL)
agency.summary: Promotes and improves the welfare, working conditions, opportunities, benefits and rights of wage earners, job seekers, and retirees of the United States.
agency.lede: Promotes and improves the welfare, working conditions, opportunities, benefits and rights of wage earners, job seekers, and retirees of the United States.

eligibility.label: You have a disability or impairment
You are unable to work for a year or more because of a disability or your disability is expected to result in death
You worked in the coal mining industry and suffer from an illness caused by black lung disease (pneumoconiosis)

benefit.title: Retirement benefits for mothers/fathers
benefit.summary: Replacement income for qualified retirees and their families.

agency.title: Social Security Administration (SSA)
agency.summary: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.

benefit.title: Extra help with Medicare prescription drug plan (Part D) costs
benefit.summary: Helps with the cost of prescription drugs, like deductibles and copays.

agency.summary: Administers Social Security, as well as disability insurance, and other benefits.

benefit.summary: Direct assistance to American Indians and Alaska Natives, including financial, child, burial, emergency, and adult care assistance.
